video_description:
Meet the Fully-Loaded Thrive Tablet, with SD card slot, HDMI, USB and mini-USB ports and Six Color Options. The First Tablet to Get it Right. thetoshibatablet.com. 

Original Airdate July 11th, 2011
title: Thrive Tablet: Features #1 (Official Toshiba TV Commercial)
